original_text: If you want to decide an ordinary matter like that, what do you do? Sometimes you go to a judge who does not believe in God. You should never do that! The church does not respect people like that.
korean_text: 그런즉 너희가 세상 사건이 있을 때에 교회에서 경히 여김을 받는 자들을 세우느냐

sentences.original_text: If you want to decide an ordinary matter
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 평범한 문제를 결정하고 싶다면

sentences.original_text: Sometimes you go to a judge
who does not believe in God

sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 결코 그렇게 해서는 안 됩니다!

sentences.original_text: The church does not respect people
